Name: 5agado
AboutMe:
Personal website

Graduate Computer Science master student at EIT Digital; still trying to understand what is good, bad or better. Strongly passionate about CS stuff, I'm currently refining my Data Scientist skills and expertise, dedicating myself to areas like statistics, machine learning, data visualization, NLP, big-data and software design and engineering. I'm working in improving my programming and developing skills with Java and Python; practicing functional approach with OCaml and Erlang; always open to new technologies/paradigms and eventually-interesting alternatives.

AI and ALife Worshiper, just really waiting to welcome our new robot overlords.

I am a very pragmatic and concrete person, nevertheless in my spare time I train some of my artistic/creative skills, also working as a freelance artist realizing both traditional and digital artworks.

Additional interests include lucid dreaming and the overall understanding of the brain, transhumanism, rhetoric, epistemology, fitness and well-being. Follower of the Less Wrong approach to thinking.
